Explained

HTML

I am making an effort thinking mark-up being clean og readable. I keep using the same structur so every project has an easy recognizability.

SCSS

I use mixins, variables and nesting to make styling much easier. SCSS is my default CSS language but I have no trouble using LESS.

jQuery

I use jQuery to trigger animations and make components behave the way I want them to behave. By the way! I'm busy learning Vue.js

Gulp

I use Gulp to compile and minify SCSS with prefixes, minifying JS and compress images. I also use Gulp to setup a localhost to run it all and browsersync to refresh when chages are made.

Jekyll

I use Jekyll with YML/JSON and Liquid to generate smarter templates using collections and layout. This allows me to have my components in one place only, so I donâ€™t have to repeat a footer or navigation on every page for example.

Bootstrap

I am a super user in both Bootstrap v.3.* and v.4*. I am tweaking their variables to fit my needs, and I like to use their mixins to make my own components with my naming.
